resources.string: With just one click, you can now enhance photo resolutions, improve quality, and unblur photos really quick.
With Deep Learning based Photo Colorizer, you can add consistent and natural colors to your old black and white photos.
Instantly remove background from your photos with just one click with superb cutout quality and stunning edge details
Hi, I am ChroMia, your AI Chatbot. How can I help you ?
Welcome to ChroMagic – Redefining Image Transformation!

• Colorize Black & White Photos
• Photo Pixel Enhancement
• Photo Background Removal
• User-Friendly Interface
• Supports Multiple Languages
• Chat Support With Chatbot
• Share Your Creations
At ChroMagic, we aim to make image transformation accessible to everyone by merging powerful AI technologies with simplicity and elegance.
We value your feedback to make ChroMagic even better! Report bugs or suggestions through the in-app \'Report Bug\' option.
Based on - DeOldify, ESRGAN, and MODNet. Special thanks to our dedicated team and community!
We have ChroMia, our AI chatbot to assist the users with various app-related queries.
Riddhi Mitra\nRole: App Designer\nA 4th year B.Tech(ECE) student from GNIT, Kolkata. He is a passionate Android Developer.
Arkajit Bhattacharjee\nRole: App Backend Handler\nA 4th year B.Tech(ECE) student from GNIT, Kolkata. He is a passionate Android Developer.
Kunal Bag\nRole: AI-ML Engineer\nA 4th year B.Tech(AI-ML) student from NSEC, Kolkata.He is a Machine Learning Engineer.

ChroMagic stands out for its blend of AI innovation and user-centric design. Our state-of-the-art algorithms ensure precise, high-quality results, making it the perfect choice for photography enthusiasts, content creators, and anyone who cherishes their photos.
